meanings.sent1: Please remove your shoes before entering the house.
meanings.sent2: I need to remove the old paint before applying a new coat.
meanings.sent3: He tried to remove the frown from his face but couldn't help smiling.
meanings.sent4: Her words had the power to remove all doubts from my mind.
meanings.sent5: The magician performed a trick to remove the coin from behind my ear.

meanings.sent1: To stay healthy, it's important to remove unhealthy habits from your routine.
meanings.sent2: The team decided to remove the weakest player from the lineup.
meanings.sent3: She wanted to remove all traces of the embarrassing incident from her memory.
meanings.sent4: The detective worked tirelessly to remove any possibility of error from the investigation.
meanings.sent5: The antivirus software can effectively remove any threats from your computer.

meanings.sent1: The dentist needed to remove the decayed tooth to relieve the pain.
meanings.sent2: To make tea, you need to remove the tea bag after it has steeped for a few minutes.
meanings.sent3: She tried to remove the key information from the lengthy report.
meanings.sent4: The archaeologist carefully removed the ancient artifact from the excavation site.
meanings.sent5: The recipe requires you to remove the seeds from the fruit before blending.

meanings.sent1: The floodwaters can remove people from their homes and displace them to safer areas.
meanings.sent2: The new road construction will remove some trees and displace the local wildlife.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected arrival of the new employee will remove the current manager from his position.
meanings.sent4: The strong winds can remove loose objects and displace them across the yard.
meanings.sent5: The earthquake had the power to remove entire buildings and displace families.

meanings.sent1: You can use an eraser to remove the mistake from your paper.
meanings.sent2: The digital artist can easily remove unwanted elements from the image.
meanings.sent3: She wished she could remove the hurtful words she had said in anger.
meanings.sent4: Time cannot remove the memories, but it can soften their edges.
meanings.sent5: The storm seemed to remove all traces of the sandcastle, as if it had never existed.
